messages.title: VOTE FOR BRENDA PORTER
messages.content: As Southport’s Prospective Conservative MP I like many others have concerns for the future of our country and how the consequences of the last 13 years of a Labour Government will affect us as individuals and as a community.

issues.brexitEurope: As an ex MEP Mr Clegg is very pro-Europe.
issues.economy: Gordon Brown has led us into the worst economic predicament since World War Two with an unprecedented level of national debt which threatens our recovery from a recession made worse for the UK because of his handling of our economy.
issues.education: Improve our health service, raise standards in schools and ensure our pensioners are treated with respect and dignity with an assured quality of life.
issues.health: Improve our health service, raise standards in schools and ensure our pensioners are treated with respect and dignity with an assured quality of life.
issues.socialWelfare: Improve our health service, raise standards in schools and ensure our pensioners are treated with respect and dignity with an assured quality of life.

leaflet.personalStatement: With my commitment to Southport, already a proven fact; and with your support I can be Southport’s strong voice in Westminster. Please give me your support I will not let you down.

quotes.text: A local lady with a commitment to Southport, already a proven fact; and with your support I can be Southport’s strong voice in Westminster. Please give me your support I will not let you down.

We need a steady hand with credible plans for jobs and growth and a return to family values, we need a new Government. It is recognised a hung Parliament would be a disaster for a country so badly affected with an economic crisis, and desperately in need of a Government with a mandate, and courage, to take tough decisions to get our country back on track and again be ‘Great Britain’; David Cameron can do this job with a Conservative Government.

images.caption: Leaflet page showing a message from Brenda Porter, Conservative candidate for Southport

leaflet.additionalNotes: Promoted & Printed by David Woodridge on behalf of Brenda Porter, both of Southport Conservative Offices, Stanley Street, Southport PR9 0BY.
